note.p: Daughter of William Williams, servant. Married William Parker Snow in Southampton in 1839.
Bexley, Kent, England, cemetery registers, 1879–1985 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 January 2018)
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1469/424/58), 1891 (RG12/635/129/15)
Certificate of marriage, 29 April 1839, Southampton (General Register Office, England)
